channel.title: Nielsen on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Broadcast Falls Below 20 Percent of TV Use for the First Time
item.description: Netflix, led by ‘Ginny & Georgia,’ has a strong June and streaming once again outpaces traditional TV.
